definitions.definition: In reciprocal succession ; succeeding by turns; in alternate order. Synonym: alternatingly
By alternation; when, in a proportion , the antecedent term is compared with antecedent, and consequent .

main_definition: In reciprocal succession ; succeeding by turns; in alternate order. Synonym: alternatingly
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) By alternation; when, in a proportion , the antecedent term is compared with antecedent, and consequent .
( chiefly Canada , US , sometimes proscribed ) Alternatively .
